wikipedia_page.main: Billy Williams  (born 1896) was a Welsh international footballer. He was part of the Wales national football team, playing 1 match and scoring 1 goal on 14 February 1925 against Scotland during the 1924–25 British Home Championship. In doing so, he became the first, and so far only, Northampton Town player to score an international goal.

response: Billy Williams (born 1938) is an American Hall of Fame baseball player.
